entry.title: India Faces Conundrum for Its Sprawling Railways: Fix the Old or Build New
entry.content: The country has invested in high-speed trains and modern technology but did far less to repair old tracks, improve safety and hone its workforce skills.

entry.title: Smoke From Canada Wildfires to Move South, Ease in Northeast
entry.content: The changing picture will bring relief to millions who have been choked this week by thick smoke and hazy skies. The smoke is expected to move south, but conditions will be much less severe.
